Objects

Class Stock

  • java.lang.Object
    • Objects.Stock

  • public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object
    the Stock class is a list of items used to store multiple items in the same location.
    Author:
    Matthew Pini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stock()
      Creates a Stock

      returns how many Items are in stock

      Returns the name and re-order amount for all Items within the stock
